channel.title: AncientBlitz - Stable | Flawless Pk + Switching | Pk Server | 100% Duel Arena
channel.description:
This is my new project based off a blank PI. I will be making a Pk Server/Spawn. Items that are donated for or bought for Pk Points will not be spawn-able and only those item's. I'm aiming to make this a big server and I might need a team later on. Currently have a Hoster who bought a VPS. Now lets move on to some features and media about the server! NOTE: I just made this and will be updating it daily. [center][size=14pt]Features![/size] - Very Stable - Flawless Switching - 100% duel arena(All PI dupes fixed) - Over 85% Flawless combat system. - Teleporting through Dialogue's not Mage Book. - Pk points, Donar points, PK Point shop. - 80% Added Handcannon. - 100% hitmarks with every Sprite - Rocktail + Torva Hp effects! - 100% Constitution with every number working! Ex: If your 990 constitution and someone hits a 73 on you you will now have 917 Constitution. - More To be added!
Media!
Pictures! (Coming soon)
Videos! http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gJ79_vW5ZeM http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=h92B8R9u_zo (NOTE: MUST WATCH IN HD AND FULLSCREEN!)
Please don't flame, more updates will come. Thanks. Credits: Insanity - for creating PI (If he is the one who did) [/center]

item.title: AncientBlitz - Stable | Flawless Pk + Switching | Pk Server | 100% Duel Arena
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

[quote=“k1ng0frs, post:9, topic:428936”][quote author=runewings317 link=topic=531631.msg3884976#msg3884976 date=1326373128]

there is no point in adding 508 maps unless you fix all the bugs in it
[/quote]Yea, but I need the maps… I’m still looking for GWD cause those maps are gone… =.= Grrr… Also I want the Ancient Cavern and Fist of Guthix maps…

Asshole_rule Released Fog Mapdata[/quote]Well yea, but not the objects… And I don’t know how the fuck to get the objects :S

Read full topic

item.title: AncientBlitz - Stable | Flawless Pk + Switching | Pk Server | 100% Duel Arena
item.dc:creator: @kill_you704 kill you704
item.description:
@kill_you704 wrote:

[quote=“C++ Imbued, post:16, topic:428936”][quote author=lostmyphat link=topic=531631.msg3884725#msg3884725 date=1326336490]
A 474 pi, you don’t see many of those anymore. I like it
[/quote]No this is not a 474, look at the video he is wearing torva that is not a 474 item.

Good luck ;)[/quote]
Thanks, and its more of a 508 revision cache of a 317 PI because Torva was a customly added item. The actual item models only go up to PVP Armour’s. (Like Vesta, Statius, Ect…)

Read full topic

item.title: AncientBlitz - Stable | Flawless Pk + Switching | Pk Server | 100% Duel Arena
item.dc:creator: @kill_you704 kill you704
item.description:
@kill_you704 wrote:

[quote=“Team_Rocket, post:8, topic:428936”]1. Why do you need a Host who buys a V.P.S?
2. What do you plan to do to make it more stable?[/quote]

  1. I need a host that buys a V.P.S because I only work with hosters that are 24/7 and because I plan on making this big soon. Plus, I can’t afford a VPS.
  2. I plan to clean it out as much as possible and only add the features needed, I also plan on hosting it on the most stable V.P.S I can because this will be a Pk Server, with a few skills, and anyone who enjoys Pking does not enjoy DC’s or any type of glitches in the server.

Read full topic

@kill_you704 wrote:

runewings317:

Not flaming or trolling, but what have you done to make it stable? Just curious Looks great!

Nothing much yet, just started on fixing up stability and combat first, I have added most 508 maps but some are glitched so I’m trying to fix those first but as you saw I do have 100% Strong hold so far!

item.title: AncientBlitz - Stable | Flawless Pk + Switching | Pk Server | 100% Duel Arena
item.dc:creator: @kill_you704 kill you704
item.description:
@kill_you704 wrote:

This is my new project based off a blank PI. I will be making a Pk Server/Spawn. Items that are donated for or bought for Pk Points will not be spawn-able and only those item’s. I’m aiming to make this a big server and I might need a team later on. Currently have a Hoster who bought a VPS. Now lets move on to some features and media about the server!
NOTE: I just made this and will be updating it daily.
[center][size=14pt]Features![/size]

  • Very Stable
  • Flawless Switching
  • 100% duel arena(All PI dupes fixed)
  • Over 85% Flawless combat system.
  • Teleporting through Dialogue’s not Mage Book.
  • Pk points, Donar points, PK Point shop.
  • 80% Added Handcannon.
  • 100% hitmarks with every Sprite
  • Rocktail + Torva Hp effects!
  • 100% Constitution with every number working! Ex: If your 990 constitution and someone hits a 73 on you you will now have 917 Constitution.
  • More To be added!

Media!

Pictures!
(Coming soon)

Videos!



(NOTE: MUST WATCH IN HD AND FULLSCREEN!)

Please don’t flame, more updates will come. Thanks.
Credits:
Insanity - for creating PI (If he is the one who did)
[/center]
